mapper.sql: ActionId, ActionName, ActionType, `Level`, ParentActionId, DeleteFlag, RowVersion
mapper.insert: insert into action (ActionId, ActionName, ActionType, `Level`, ParentActionId, DeleteFlag, RowVersion) values (#{actionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentActionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{rowVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update action set ActionName = #{actionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ActionType = #{actionType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `Level` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ParentActionId = #{parentActionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DeleteFlag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, RowVersion = #{rowVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ActionId = #{actionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
